title: 我的世界1.8 怎么用
author: huzhiyuan2014
txt_content:
Minecraft Snapshot 快照 14w02c 发布 !! 

更新 : " c " 的快照修复大量崩溃 ! 

Minecraft Snapshot 快照 14w02c ( Jar 文件 ) 
https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/versions/14w02c/14w02c.jar 

Minecraft Snapshot 快照 14w02c ( Json 文件 ) 
https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/versions/14w02c/14w02c.json 

Server files : 
Cross-platform jar:https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/versions/14w02c/minecraft_server.14w02c.jar 
Windows EXE: https://s3.amazonaws.com/Minecraft.Download/versions/14w02c/minecraft_server.14w02c.exe 

网友们给我这些，请问怎么用吖？

replies.author: 猫与猫草
replies.txt_content: 其实你直接下个MCLauncher再点更新游戏就可以选择你喜欢的版本下载，网上的jar可能和启动器不兼容，直接用启动器更新游戏就好
